hot key.translation[0].definitions[0].de: one or more keys that you can press on a computer keyboard to make the computer quickly do a particular set of actions
hot key.translation[1].definitions[0].de: one or more computer keys that have been programmed to make your computer do a particular thing when you press them
hot key.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Use the mouse or a hot key to move to a different window.
